Seal Point Park.address: 1901 J Hart Clinton Dr , San Mateo , CA 94401
reviewComments: Stopped in the eat our lunch. Nice little park atop an old dump but hey good view of the bay and it's free.

CuriOdyssey.address: 1651 Coyote Point Dr , San Mateo , CA 94401-1002
reviewComments: Lots of hands on stuff for the young ones to manipulate, and also a small selection of animals. We saw the otters being fed when we were there; very cute!
